quotes.message: Let us go forth with fear and courage and rage to save the world.
quotes.name: Grace Paley

quotes.message: It's up to us to save the world for tomorrow: it's up to you and me.
quotes.name: Jane Goodall

quotes.message: You begin saving the world by saving one man at a time; all else is grandiose romanticism or politics.
quotes.name: Charles Bukowski

quotes.message: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has.
quotes.name: Margaret Mead

quotes.message: With our love, we could save the world.
quotes.name: George Harrison

quotes.message: Anytime you try to be a loving person, you're doing your part to save the world.
quotes.name: Marianne Williamson

quotes.message: To save the world requires faith and courage: faith in reason, and courage to proclaim what reason shows to be true.
quotes.name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.message: The only thing that can save the world is the reclaiming of the awareness of the world. That's what poetry does.
quotes.name: Allen Ginsberg

quotes.message: Tell the world what scares you most. Save the world with some advice from the future.
quotes.name: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.message: To save the world is the simplest thing in the world. All one has to do is think.
quotes.name: Leonard Peikoff

quotes.message: God always saves the world from the consequences of unintended errors of men who live in fear of Him.
quotes.name: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.message: Whoever saves one life, saves the world entire.
quotes.name: Thomas Keneally

quotes.message: The best way to save the world is to see every plant and every animal you see as the last plant and the last animal in the world!
quotes.name: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.message: It isnâ€™t every day that you get to save the world.
quotes.name: Kailin Gow

quotes.message: We save the world by being alive ourselves.
quotes.name: Joseph Campbell

quotes.message: We're either going to save the world or no one will be saved.
quotes.name: Maurice Strong

quotes.message: People can save the world by the way they think and by the way they behave and what they hold to be important.
quotes.name: Cyndi Lauper

quotes.message: You need to get up in the morning and say, 'Boy, I'm going to - in my own stupid way - save the world today.
quotes.name: Carol Bellamy

quotes.message: There's nothing like a mission to save the world to liven up a vacation.
quotes.name: Donita K. Paul
